comment: Set unsigned true for ipb_id and ipb_parent_block_id in ipblocks table

before.name: ipblocks
before.comment: Blocks against user accounts, IP addresses and IP ranges.

columns.name: ipb_id
columns.comment: Primary key, introduced for privacy.

columns.name: ipb_address
columns.comment: Blocked IP address in dotted-quad form or user name.

columns.name: ipb_user
columns.comment: Blocked user ID or 0 for IP blocks.

columns.name: ipb_by_actor
columns.comment: Actor who made the block.

columns.name: ipb_reason_id
columns.comment: Key to comment_id. Text comment made by blocker.

columns.name: ipb_timestamp
columns.comment: Creation (or refresh) date in standard YMDHMS form. IP blocks expire automatically.

columns.name: ipb_auto
columns.comment: Indicates that the IP address was banned because a banned user accessed a page through it. If this is 1, ipb_address will be hidden, and the block identified by block ID number.

columns.name: ipb_anon_only
columns.comment: If set to 1, block applies only to logged-out users

columns.name: ipb_create_account
columns.comment: Block prevents account creation from matching IP addresses

columns.name: ipb_enable_autoblock
columns.comment: Block triggers autoblocks

columns.name: ipb_expiry
columns.comment: Time at which the block will expire. May be "infinity"

columns.name: ipb_range_start
columns.comment: Start of an address range, in hexadecimal size chosen to allow IPv6. FIXME: this field were originally blank for single-IP blocks, but now it's populated. No migration was ever done. It should be fixed to be blank again for such blocks (T51504).

columns.name: ipb_range_end
columns.comment: End of an address range, in hexadecimal size chosen to allow IPv6. FIXME: this field were originally blank for single-IP blocks, but now it's populated. No migration was ever done. It should be fixed to be blank again for such blocks (T51504).

columns.name: ipb_deleted
columns.comment: Flag for entries hidden from users and Sysops

columns.name: ipb_block_email
columns.comment: Block prevents user from accessing Special:Emailuser

columns.name: ipb_allow_usertalk
columns.comment: Block allows user to edit their own talk page

columns.name: ipb_parent_block_id
columns.comment: ID of the block that caused this block to exist. Autoblocks set this to the original block so that the original block being deleted also deletes the autoblocks

columns.name: ipb_sitewide
columns.comment: Block user from editing any page on the site (other than their own user talk page).

indexes.name: ipb_address_unique
indexes.comment: Unique index to support "user already blocked" messages. Any new options which prevent collisions should be included

indexes.name: ipb_user
indexes.comment: For querying whether a logged-in user is blocked

indexes.name: ipb_range
indexes.comment: For querying whether an IP address is in any range

indexes.name: ipb_parent_block_id
indexes.comment: Index for removing autoblocks when a parent block is removed
